News.Title: Anondita Medicare Reports Strong H1 Performance with 117% Revenue Growth
News.Summary: Anondita Medicare delivered robust H1 results with net profit surging to 130M rupees from 60M rupees year-over-year, while revenue jumped to 541M rupees from 314M rupees. The company's EBITDA increased to 192M rupees from 97M rupees, with EBITDA margin improving to 35.49% from 30.95%.
